export.separateImageFile: Each page will be exported as a separate image file.

pageSetup.unitDescription: The unit of measurement used for the page dimensions and spacing.
pageSetup.neumeSpacingDescription: The amount of horizontal space between each neume on a line. A smaller number results in a more compact score.
pageSetup.lyricsVDescription: The vertical position of lyrics in relation to the neumes. Increase this number to lower the lyrics.
pageSetup.lyricsH: Lyrics: Minimum Distance Between Adjacent Lyrics
pageSetup.lyricsHDescription: The minimum distance between adjacent lyrics. Increase this number if the lyrics are too close together.
pageSetup.martyriaVerticalOffsetDescription: The vertical position of martyriae in relation to the rest of the neumes. Increase this number to lower the martyriae.
pageSetup.lineSpacingDescription: The minimum space between each line. The actual space between lines may be larger than this in order to avoid collisions between neumes and lyrics on adjacent lines.
pageSetup.hyphenSpacingDescription: The minimum distance between adjacent hyphens. Decrease this number to increase the number of hyphens that appear between syllables.
pageSetup.showHeaderHorizontalRuleDescription: Display a horizontal line below the header.
pageSetup.showFooterHorizontalRuleDescription: Display a horizontal line above the footer.
pageSetup.firstPageNumberDescription: The number of the first page in the score. Use $p in the header or footer to insert the page number.
pageSetup.useChrysanthineAccidentalsDescription: When enabled, accidentals follow Chrysanthos's original system, where their effect is proportional to the interval between the current and next note. When disabled, fixed values from the 1881 Patriarchal system are used instead. This setting affects audio playback and MusicXML export.
pageSetup.disableFthoraRestrictionsDescription: Enables placement of a fthora on any note, bypassing standard notational conventions. Intended for edge cases or non-traditional usages.
pageSetup.alignIsonIndicatorsDescription: Lines up all ison indicators with the highest one on each line, for a cleaner and more consistent appearance.
pageSetup.melkiteRtlDescription: Displays the score from right to left. Intended for Melkite scores in Arabic. Uses a specialized RTL neume font.
pageSetup.lyricsMelismaCutoffWidthDescription: Melisma lines shorter than this value will not be displayed. This helps prevent them from being mistaken for punctuation marks, such as periods or commas. To disable melisma lines entirely, set this to a large number.
pageSetup.disableGreekMelismataDescription: Prevents automatic use of the Greek melismatic convention, even when Greek text is detected. Useful for languages that use the Greek script but follow different notational conventions.
pageSetup.dropCapsDescription: The default styling for all drop caps in the score.
pageSetup.lyricsDescription: The default styling for all lyrics in the score.
pageSetup.textBoxesDescription: The default styling for all text boxes in the score.
pageSetup.modeKeysDescription: The default styling for all mode keys in the score.
pageSetup.neumesDescription: The default styling for all neumes in the score.
pageSetup.neumeBulkColorDescription: To change the color of multiple neumes at once, select the neume types above, choose a color, and click the button to apply the color to all selected neumes.

playbackSettings.diatonicZoAttractionDescription: If checked, hymns that use the diatonic scale will automatically have the note Zo lowered if the melody does not ascend past Zo.
playbackSettings.classicLegetosDescription: If checked, hymns in the fourth mode with base notes Pa or Vou will use the classic legetos scale with Vou lowered.
